__e: I am rarely, if ever, opposed to such things except now.
- Well, if you're so adamant against teaming up with him, what are we doing here?
I mean, no offense, but I'm against this war.
I like it to be by an opponent worthy of my respect.
If you can't keep control when you're kicking a bag, what happens against an opponent who can fight back?
He went into the boxing ring for money... and he hit his opponent to death.
And I've decided who should oppose you.
Lang likes to hurt a man to the body.
